query:
ALTER TABLE scheduled_reports 
ADD COLUMN schedule_time VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '08:00' AFTER schedule_type,
ADD COLUMN schedule_day_of_week INT AFTER schedule_time,
ADD COLUMN schedule_day_of_month INT AFTER schedule_day_of_week,
ADD COLUMN production_line_ids JSON AFTER schedule_day_of_month,
ADD COLUMN product_ids JSON AFTER production_line_ids,
ADD COLUMN include_charts TINYINT DEFAULT 1 AFTER product_ids,
ADD COLUMN include_raw_data TINYINT DEFAULT 0 AFTER include_charts,
ADD COLUMN recipients JSON AFTER include_raw_data,
ADD COLUMN cc_recipients JSON AFTER recipients,
ADD COLUMN is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1 AFTER cc_recipients,
ADD COLUMN last_run_at TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER is_active,
ADD COLUMN last_run_status ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') AFTER last_run_at,
ADD COLUMN last_run_error TEXT AFTER last_run_status,
ADD COLUMN next_run_at TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER last_run_error;
command:

ADD COLUMN schedule_time VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT '08:00' AFTER schedule_type,
ADD COLUMN schedule_day_of_week INT AFTER schedule_time,
ADD COLUMN schedule_day_of_month INT AFTER schedule_day_of_week,
ADD COLUMN production_line_ids JSON AFTER schedule_day_of_month,
ADD COLUMN product_ids JSON AFTER production_line_ids,
ADD COLUMN include_charts TINYINT DEFAULT 1 AFTER product_ids,
ADD COLUMN include_raw_data TINYINT DEFAULT 0 AFTER include_charts,
ADD COLUMN recipients JSON AFTER include_raw_data,
ADD COLUMN cc_recipients JSON AFTER recipients,
ADD COLUMN is_active TINYINT DEFAULT 1 AFTER cc_recipients,
ADD COLUMN last_run_at TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER is_active,
ADD COLUMN last_run_status ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') AFTER last_run_at,
ADD COLUMN last_run_error TEXT AFTER last_run_status,
ADD COLUMN next_run_at TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER last_run_error;
